name: Custer's Last Command: The Battle of the Little Bighorn
name_original: Custer's Last Command: The Battle of the Little Bighorn
description:
Custer's Last Command: The Battle of the Little Bighorn is a strategy game developed by Incredible Simulations. It came out on 01-01-1995. It was published by Incredible Simulations.
You can play Custer's Last Command: The Battle of the Little Bighorn on PC.
